name: Be Zen
description:
BeZen is the prototype of a strategy game in which you need to stop those bastard ninja to flow down the river. For this you will use your rock skipping abilities.

Throw rocks to the ninja skipping over the surface of the water, avoid the plants, ricochet on the enemies and do not waste your precious rocks.

------

It is a game in development, I have worked in the motor, since is all hand crafted, and now I have to implement some simple mechanics and elements and develop the levels, increasing complexity (right now is ridiculously simple).
